Question
========
What is the recommended step before you start working on a repository locally?

Answerlist
----------
* Delete the local repository and re-clone it
* Push your local changes immediately
* Create a new branch every time
* Pull the latest changes from GitHub.com

Solution
========
Pulling first ensures your local copy is up to date and avoids conflicts.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
